taxon_name.authority: Tuckerman ex Kükenthal in H. G. A. Engler

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family cyperaceae;genus carex;section careyanae;species laxiculmis;variety laxiculmis

bio:treatment.description: Leaves usually glaucous; widest blade 6.4–11.8 mm wide. Longest staminate spike (10–)12–25 mm. 2n = 44, 46.
Low, wet, deciduous or mixed deciduous-evergreen forests, along edges of springs, seeps, and streams, usually clay soils;
Ont.; Ala., Ark., Conn., Del., D.C., Ga., Ill., Ind., Iowa, Ky., Maine, Md., Mass., Mich., Mo., N.H., N.J., N.Y., N.C., Ohio, Pa., R.I., S.C., Tenn., Vt., Va., W.Va., Wis.
